doc.field: Cab ride home, Michael Musto and Albert on Street ("Food Rap"), Pop Tarts at China Club, 5 Ninth Avenue, Eric and Hapi Phace go to Park Opera
Cab ride home, Michael Musto and Albert on Street ("Food Rap"), Pop Tarts at China Club, 5 Ninth Avenue, Eric and Hapi Phace go to Park Opera

[1] -- Cab ride home, 6/14/1987 [2] -- Michael Musto and Albert on Street ("Food Rap"), 6/14/1987 [3] -- Pop Tarts at China Club, 6/14/1987 [4] -- 5 Ninth Avenue, 6/15/1987 [5] -- Eric and Hapi Phace go to Park Opera, 6/16/1987
This DVD is divided into 3 parts:
Part 1 features Michael Musto and Larry T listening to musics and rapping on a street corner of New York.
Part 2 is a continuation of Nelson following his friends. He records his car ride with Larry T.

Part 3 allows us to get a tour of Nelson's bedroom, filled with a shoe and tie collection, oil painting supplies, and an editing center. Nelson and his friends then take a trip through a New York City park and bump into some acquaintances, Carey, Rose, and their baby Emily, while walking around.
